website_summaries.verdict: Other laptops offer the same mainstream graphics power for less, but the Asus ROG Strix GL753 dresses it up with a nice display and game-friendly extras.
pros: Centered around its Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti GPU, the 17-inch Asus ROG Strix GL753VE-DS74 has very good gaming performance, and Asus' Gaming Center software lets you quickly customize things like fan speed and the four-zone RGB-backlit keyboard
The body stays cool while gaming, and its fans don't get too loud
cons: The keyboard and touchpad are small for a 17-inch laptop
The same GPU can be found in other laptops for hundreds less

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within 2 weeks! I had to ship it back and wait days for a refund. The process took over a week. Meanwhile my son (a college student who I purchased it for) had to go over a week without a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like my laptop. But I should admit that it have cons. CONS. The battery life sucks!!! It works about 1,5-2 hours maximum without power adapter. It’s heavy and thick! Without power adapter you can’t play heavy games. So I will advice to use it as desktop pc. I bought also a MacBook Air, so I use my Asus RoG as desktop. It’s static on my table. The design is not good. Orange stripes look cheap. PROS. Nice display Very powerful performance Beautiful keyboard and backlit Also want to warn you that not all new heavy games can be played on max. settings, but it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Smart message the the Secondary hard drive gone bad after ...
customer_reviews.text: Secondary hard drive went bad after one year. Disappointing but it held up to everything I threw at it which is really just a couple new Games. Died after 2 years, which is not an acceptable return period in my book. It looks nice functionally and aesthetically it was nice to work with but 1200 for a laptop that only last two years is not good and based on the reviews it seem I got more than some people. My advice, try another brand until Asus sort them selves out, that’s what am gonna do!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ralston H.

customer_reviews.title: Is not compatible with windows 10
customer_reviews.text: runs massively slow when trying to accomplish simple tasks like using word. is not compatible with windows 10 updates. they fail repeatedly. i have taken to IT department at Yale and we have wiped the computer 2x and followed every googleable way to fix. my disk is running at 100% most of the time even upon restart so all othet applications are constantly “not responding” will be returning or throwing away
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! I made ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! I made the mistake of buying this piece of junk in Feb 2017. Within 3 months, the laptop suddenly refused to power up. Luckily it was within warranty and I got the motherboard replaced. About a year later, the (new) motherboard conks off again. ASUS tells me that the cost to repair is more than $1K and I should take my product back. I REPEAT - DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Rajas

customer_reviews.title: This laptop failed to boot twice. The first time ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop failed to boot twice. The first time i sent the unit back to ASUS and their RMA process takes 1 month to complete and they do not extend your warranty upon completion. The next time it failed ASUS wanted to process it the same way leading to another month without the device without any form of compensation. I instead contacted Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse King

customer_reviews.title: this laptop was the most wonderful thing I ever had in my life until the ...
customer_reviews.text: at first, this laptop was the most wonderful thing I ever had in my life until the problems started to creep up on me. please stay away from this laptop there's something wrong with its motherboard and software. it would run into frequent blue screens a few months after use and sometimes it would freeze while I was listing to music and would not recognize my headphones anymore. and then finally after one month of that chrome and edge would keep freezing and won't load anymore I had to do several restarts but after that, it still didn't work I had to do 2 factory resets and the problem still didn't get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can get VERY hot and overheat with its poor excuse for a fan
customer_reviews.text: The computer runs well but, the screen is very loose, and unless you baby the thing, the lid will break. It can get VERY hot and overheat with its poor excuse for a fan. It runs most games like CS:GO and LOL without breaking a sweat but if you start trying anything else, it will run very hot. Replacing this computer with something a bit sturdier and cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Problems Galore
customer_reviews.text: Twice I had this laptop replaced, twice the hardware went bad. First time I bought it, it wasn't even two weeks later when the video card failed. Amazon replaced it quickly and sent me a brand new machine. 1 month later, the monitor stopped working and the keyboard became unresponsive. It's disappointing because this laptop is a steal at this price. Returned and refunded. I'll be staying away from Asus for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P.

customer_reviews.title: Suddently Died, No Power
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on January 11, 2017. Power will not turn on, and no lights go on as of today. Did a search and tried all the simple "fixes" and nothing made a difference. There seem to be a lot of people with similar issues with ASUS laptops. Checked the power cord, tried it without the cord, held the power button down, etc. Nothing worked. I also came across a lot of stories about horrible customer support from ASUS. I hope my experience is better. I've bought a LOT of ASUS motherboards and other parts over the last 20 years. Their laptop quality is not impressing me right now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Asus is a crap company
customer_reviews.text: This computer died after 1.5 years. Stay away from Asus everyone!! They have terrible customer service. They said they could try to fix the problem but it was going to be at least $600 to do it. No thanks that's half the price of laptop. Crazy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Update. The laptop is garbage. The hinge started to fail after few months and dealing with Asus to fix it has been a nightmare. Returned the laptop to Amazon. I will never buy another Asus product as long as I shall live. I have never personally owned a laptop prior to this one but my wife has had a laptop since she was in high school, which is almost 20 years at this point and it still works flawlessly. Asus obviously does not care for the quality of the products they release.
customer_reviews.author: kevin sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Quick, powerful, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed, power, and look of this laptop, Its everything I wanted at a reasonable price. Unlike some bigger name makes, this feels solid and has a cd which many do not any more or charge more for. This has plenty of memory and starts amazingly quick.Received many compliments and puts on quite a show with the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Itpaystotalk

customer_reviews.title: Works well, plays the games well too.
customer_reviews.text: It's working as intended and has been sent off to college with my child. For the game curious folks it plays StarCraft, Civ 5, Overwatch and League of Legends well. Much love for the keyboard, it's like a real keyboard with good tactile response. I'm thinking of picking up another one and of course I do like the ASUS brand as it has always been a reliable computer brand for me.
customer_reviews.author: gadlaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent System!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked long and hard and compared many many gaming laptop systems. This one offered the best bang for the buck at the time. We have had it about 6 months and it gets used ALOT!!! Every day, every single day, for hours. No problems what so ever. My son asked if we could scrap the Disney vacation and get us both gaming computers instead. I couldn't turn that down. So I was extra selective with his. I built mine and they are almost identical. Performance and reliability are top notch!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great College PC for a Game developer major
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a laptop for his game development classes - and this one is doing the job. He's running the Maya entertainment suite just fine. Along with the other tools he needs; Photoshop, Visual studios, etc. Price is right for a good machine that exceeded the requirements of the software he's using.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent gaming capabilities but painfully slow with everything else.
customer_reviews.text: Decent gaming capabilities, but painfully slow with everything else. I'm in the process of uninstalling some of the programs that came with it to see if that helps, but I get the feeling I may have to reinstall windows or something. There are moments when windows explorer doesn't respond for several seconds. Startup takes several minutes and that's no exaggeration. I'm able to play games on very high graphics settings, but my ASUS from nearly 3 years ago can still start up, launch programs, and do just about anything faster than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Extremely  disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased ASUS GL553V laptop from amazon which turned out to be a defected piece. I happened to find this after 4 months when it start showing problems. I had got the laptop serviced thrice within a year with extremely poor service provided, During my fourth service ,the first month after my warranty expired they detected a mother board failure, just within 11 months from the purchase date. Extremely disappointed with the product purchased from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Veera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this laptop, it looks nice, it has everything I need and a bit more. However, the build quality is not top notch, the monitor bends easily, and the whole body feels more plasticy than I would like. The battery is giving me only 3 hours with minimum load.
customer_reviews.author: Husam AbuZaid

customer_reviews.title: The screen size and brightness are good as the operating system itself
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laptop after 50 years or so of desk top computers. The unit is everything I had hoped for. The screen size and brightness are good as the operating system itself. I am not a power-gamer art all, but it handles the few games I do play without trouble. I have yet to put Office on it but I will eventually. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Really solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase! I was looking for a powerfull laptop that would allow me to run some 3D programs as well as Photoshop and Illustrator and it handle them smoothly. It was everything I was hopping for with 2 main downsides for it that I can think of: - battery runs out pretty quickly. (Something around 2hs) - fans are quite loud somethings with the need for it. The asus control center only lets you boost the fans, but there are no options to reduce them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFULL Fast quiet gamming comp. at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast comp. i use it to play games like witcher 3 i currently have witcher 1/2/3 and diablo 2 and 3and a few other large games downloaded onto this computer, and it holds up not over heating even after 6-7 hour gaming sessions, never slows and is vary quiet, AND FAST all in all good price in compared to other gaming computers, arrived right on time in supper protective box, there is NO way it could get damaged in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great! I’ve played videogames my entire life, the past 5 years or so have been on PC and this laptop gets the job done! The only issue I have noticed is that it is very hard to find the exact charger for this computer, so if you buy this keep the cords away from pets and kids!
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Not a good video editing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for at least 3 months and then begin to have driver problems with none of the solutions, that were looked up online, able to fix the problem. Then the computer somehow updated and fixed itself. Months later (a month ago) it does it all again. I lose any Nividia graphic card support for exporting videos or rendering effects. Has made me lose clients and a lot of money. Was great when it worked and played games well. But for video editing this would have been great but it's ridiculously unreliable and doesn't handle tough gpu accelerated effects.
customer_reviews.author: Austin s.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S FREEZING RANDOMLY - CHRONIC PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: Since i bought it was freezing randomly and unless you force it to shutdown it's not responding. it was rare but now it so often and it's unusable. Im so regretting to buy it. I'll never buy an ASUS product again. I checked ram, hdd. they're all working well. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Volkan

customer_reviews.title: Ummm, Display Problems?
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laptop until the screen started getting spots all over the place? I see others have complained too. I would like to have a working replacement, otherwise this laptop is pretty frickin sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Coon

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best laptop I have ever owned. It is great for gaming but I wanted a nice sturdy reliable laptop for just about everything else and this one lives up to what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tac5769

customer_reviews.title: Speed, speed, speed...
customer_reviews.text: Did not understand it was super gaming product. Grandson tales it everywhere and tells me he’s using it to “study” but I know better!
customer_reviews.author: C. B. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fast, powerful, runs everything I have tried. A little on the loud side but that is expected with the 1050ti
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plastic hinge cover broke.
customer_reviews.text: The binding that allows the screen to pivot broke just after the warranty expired. It also causes the screen framing to pull away in that corner. I can still open and shut, but sometimes it does not shut all the way. Other than that, I was happy with the product I purchased. I probably open and shut the laptop about 1 time a day for the past year. No problems with running games.
customer_reviews.author: BLah

customer_reviews.title: Spent good money on this laptop and it really sucks
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this computer for a year and i cant seem to get it from locking up in the middle of use.Have to hold down power to shut off and restart.Then looses everything i started doing.Spent good money on this laptop and it really sucks.Have to buy something else.Someway get rid of this one.Support tells me to reinstall all programs which i did 6 months ago the it started again.
customer_reviews.author: thomas stowik

customer_reviews.title: Want my $1400 back.
customer_reviews.text: Crashes anytime a game is loaded after working for 6 months. No customer support. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bigbad

customer_reviews.title: I love it and would recommend for anyone looking to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is very fast and was delivered on time. I love it and would recommend for anyone looking to play online games. It runs Player Unkown Battlegrounds and Overwatch very well. And League of Legends is above 200 fps every game.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Torres

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star for the 1 year it worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this less than two years ago, keyboard went out, most likely a motherboard issue, company wants at least $500 to fix. Not going to pay for a part that may go out again. They need to have way better quality control or make the factory warranty longer. Now I have a $1000 dollar paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer! The only issue that I have until ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer! The only issue that I have until now is that they key "A" makes a strange sound after using it or tapping with that letter. The rest is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fast, light, good for all games ,high hdd, best sound system with Asus gaming app  best price for gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Best of the best needs cooling system if you are going to play more than 8 hours non-stopping . Other things to do just play and have fun don't set up any antivirus just have windows defender
customer_reviews.author: ALI NAHAS

customer_reviews.title: I had to get two of these machines & both ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to get two of these machines & both would not work right! Customer service was not competent either when I had to call them on both computers.
customer_reviews.author: beartrack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and reliable. Not a game player, I use it as my primary computer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brand

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the speed and ability to edit photos with ...
customer_reviews.text: I pondered this purchase for quite a while and looked at many reviews. I am very happy with the speed and ability to edit photos with Lightroom and Photoshop without any problems. I'm not a gamer so can't comment on that aspect but for my needs it is just what I was looking for. Great features for the price. I can't imagine needing anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fan works overtime to keep the rig cool and I've only had it a few months but ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan works overtime to keep the rig cool and I've only had it a few months but so far it's worked fine for taking my steam games on the road.
customer_reviews.author: e.Ian Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop for work! A little big, but you get so much power as a trade off!
customer_reviews.author: TylerK

customer_reviews.title: Laptop was defective.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop booted initially just fine and installed updates without issue. After all was done and I rebooted Windows myself, the system would not boot back to windows. Tried everything Asus support suggested and nothing worked. I'm returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: sdudley2011

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good buy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have a complaint is the speakers, sound is very faint. It's very hear some of the games that I play. Touch mouse don’t work half the time, the fan doesn’t cool the processor that well system closes down on me. I wasted

customer_reviews.title: Great machine! Poor battery!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! Only downside is the battery life which isn't good at all. I use the machine for architecture software and design and it has handled everything well up until now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price paid. The lighting is cool and helpful. Runs games well. Good qualiy laptop.
customer_reviews.author: comfortare

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered this, arrived the in 2 days and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this, arrived the in 2 days and as soon as i turned it on, within 5 minutes, I got an error about MEMORY_MANAGER. I then ran the memory diagnostic tool built in to Windows 10. Turns out it found a "Hardware Problem". Requested a replacement, I will revise my review upon receipt of the new machine and some basic tests. EDIT: took a couple tries, but finally got one that works as advertised, and for the money it's a really solid machine capable of handling some very cpu and RAM intensive applications side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I have been using this laptop for gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have been using this laptop for gaming and working as a computer engineer! and perfect for linux and windows.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy...she is happy...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this laptop and the fact that it's flawless and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.Weary

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the purchased
customer_reviews.text: So far playing all games (dragon age 2 and inquisition, far cry primal, pillar of eternity, etc..) in ultra setting with flawless and no issues. Fast booting. Really happy with the purchased.
customer_reviews.author: edy purwanto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast gaming setup right out of the box. beautiful picture quality running Neverwinter at 78fps
customer_reviews.author: william hoeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for streaming, editing, and some light games, if I have like 7 windows open at a time it starts to slow down but overall it's a good laptop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought in may and broke already screen won’t turn on

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other expensive laptops &  Apple MacBooks
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop , wow graphic card . super fast hard-drive . Excellent for any type of graphic work without having slow down freezing / sluggish
customer_reviews.author: USMSUPPLY

customer_reviews.title: ... a first time buyer of a gaming laptop I'm pretty satisfied but the laptop would randomly shut down for ...
customer_reviews.text: As a first time buyer of a gaming laptop I'm pretty satisfied but the laptop would randomly shut down for the first few weeks of use . It's been pretty okay since then.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best computer I have bought and perfect for running AutoCAD or any programs like it for on the fly working
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Computer, much happier than I was thinking I would be! Does everything and more!
customer_reviews.author: Iam Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop, plays just about anything I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fenter

customer_reviews.title: he is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son, he is very pleased with it. Does everything that he needs for school and play.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Settembre

customer_reviews.title: Best performance, no heating issues
customer_reviews.text: Its all what i wanted.. Best performance, no heating issues.. Suppprts everything...Overall it the best...
customer_reviews.author: Sufiyan K.

customer_reviews.title: ... it was a breeze and the 2nd one works fine.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought did not work but replacing it was a breeze and the 2nd one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hunka

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Laptop broke 28 days after the 1 year warranty ended. This caused a failure which was quoted $600 to fix by ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed. Want refund or else replacement.
customer_reviews.text: The keypad 0(Zero) keeps pressing by itself frequently. Hangs or freezes frequently which needed force shutdown. I'm totally dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered earlier than I expected. Everything worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. No huge complaints
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer, it runs well, stays cool when running hard programs, however I did notice that it does take about 15-30 seconds to want to open programs shortly after waking up from sleep mode
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Rineer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, very fast machine, very nice and very good for playung games. Thankls.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Parra

customer_reviews.title: overall perfomance is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: everything came , fast shipping, well packaged, althought the laptop itself is prone to finger prints, overall perfomance is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted but if I could do it ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than 2 months before I was unable to boot. The screen stays black and the ASUS fix does not work as you are unable to remove the battery without disassembly. Worked great while it lasted but if I could do it over again I'd skip this one. UPDATE 4/14 Returned 2 ASUS for repair 3 weeks ago currently waiting a motherboard replacement which is on back order (presumably because so many people are having the same issue). No timeline for return as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni G.

customer_reviews.title: Great speed, beautiful graphics
customer_reviews.text: My son is thrilled with his new gaming laptop. Great speed, beautiful graphics, plenty of poer to enjoy the online games he plays.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Carr

customer_reviews.title: Love my Strix
customer_reviews.text: I love my Strix. I even use it for work. Not as heavy as most 17.3 ROGs.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL QUARTERIO

customer_reviews.title: misleading listing brings down otherwise great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with my purchase, however, I have not gotten what is listed in the product description. It lists this model as having a 7200rpm 1TB hdd with the 256 SSD. I only have a 5400rpm 1TB HDD. Pretty bummed about that. I don't know who is writing these listings, but since it was sold by Amazon and fulfilled by Amazon, I'm not sure where to go from here..... ASUS, can you step up here? Otherwise, everything else is cool. But I can only give two stars based on false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Head honcho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the system so far. Doesn't overheat like my previous system. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Won't Even Boot
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged and plugged in, but laptop wouldn't boot past the ASUS startup screen before shutting off, about 3-5 seconds after pushing the power button. Tried the only possible fix recommended by ASUS of unplugging cord and holding power button for 30 seconds, but that did nothing. Pretty disappointing to get a brand new laptop that won't even start on day 1. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for the price. SSD would’ve been nice.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the new hard drive with the one from my other ASUS ROG PC and it’s been working great. I had to install a few drivers, one to get the RGB keyboard working, but that was the only thing. It’s an excellent mid-range laptop, though you’ll quickly learn 1TB isn’t that much space. It’s heavy, naturally, so have fun with that. Screen is pretty wicked; my other PC had a 15 inch. Specs are fantastic and games play smoothly. I’ve heard people having problems with this brand, but I replaced the HDD. As such, I haven’t experienced any problems others have reported, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE: Stopped working after having it for less than 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The Laptop came in the mail. We treated it very carefully. The graphics looked amazing and the speed was satisfactory. However, the patio kept restarting itself and giving us error messages, saying it was shutdown unexpectedly. Now, less than 3 weeks after we received it, the screen went completely black. The keyboard lights still come on, but nothing else. We contacted to manufacture and all they did was give us troubleshooting advice that did not work. Amazon does not have an option to contact the seller to return the item for a refund or exchange it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Fiyero

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My games and Photoshop run fabulously
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My games and Photoshop run fabulously. I love the color scheme, even though some reviewers have put it down. I change the keyboard color scheme to suit my mood. Sorry but when you first get this, you may have to look up how to change the keyboard colors. Asus does not include this in quick how to.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Don't get sparkly-eyed over the pretty lights and chassis--there's JUNK inside it.  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Owned barely a month. Worked yesterday, does not power on today. Warranty policy is I have to send back and wait 10 days for them to fix. Would not but again. UPDATE!! In fact the 10 day wait I mentioned above ended up being 26 DAYS and it is now October, 2018 and it is dead for the SECOND TIME!!! It's only been a year and a half since purchase. Extremely disappointed in this product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ro66e

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the computer ASUS ROG Strix GL553VE 15. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the computer ASUS ROG Strix GL553VE 15.6" Gaming Laptop GTX 1050Ti 4GB Intel Core i7-7700HQ 16GB DDR4 256GB SSD + 1TB 7200RPM HDD RGB Keyboard on January 22, 2106. The computer worked for approximately 2 months until an automatic upgrade totally shutdown the computer and made it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: mumma c

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was expecting and more than happy with my choice
customer_reviews.author: nasr rivers-Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last an hour!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I was incredibly excited to recieve this laptop. Moment i got it, i installed all the recommended updates. Half an hour later it was off all of a sudden. Then i tried to turn it on, but sadly, like a pretty big portion of reviewers here. The laptop had died and i was stuck on a dead screen. Went ahead and returned it. This was my 1st experience with the asus brand, and sadly my last. DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP! Just like many warnings of others on here, this product has a very high fail-rate.

customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: System Slow?  You MUST disable Superfetch
customer_reviews.text: To get the performance you paid for you MUST DISABLE "SUPERFETCH" in Windows 10. Before I did this, I noticed the hard drive was at 99-100% all the time and ran really poorly. After I did so, the system runs really well. To disable Superfetch, simple go to Start and type "cmd". Then type "services.msc". Press "s" and scroll down to superfetch. Stop Superfetch (you will notice you hard drive light goes out now, like it should). Next, change the "Startup type" to "Disabled". Enjoy your much faster system PS: If you like the tip, feel free to send me an Amazon.com gift card ;-)

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks and i love it it plays all my games good well i ...
customer_reviews.text: ok ive had this for about ..3 weeks and i love it it plays all my games good well i only play bf1 and csgo it plays bf1 on high settings pretty good id say about 55 to 60 fps, i mostly got this laptop because wanted a laptop with a little bit more punch and i use it for my photo editing and soon video editing oh some people have complained about the performance, all u need to do is go to your power settings then go to aditonal power settings and put it on balanced power..because it comes with factory settings which is low power and even counter strike go seemed a little slow but hope this helps

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with it.

customer_reviews.title: Many issues with this laptop

According to the technician, i can't even change the graphic card because it is sewed on the the board. I recommend not to buy this laptop..

customer_reviews.title: Renouncing my citizenship to Republic of Gamers
customer_reviews.text: Back it goes. Although nice, this laptop crashed about every 15-30 minutes with some kind of driver error. I mean crashed like BSOD... with just Firefox! Could I work to update it and whatnot? Maybe, but for $1376 shipped, that is what I call a defective product. I should not have to mess around to get this thing to work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good solid portable gaming platform
customer_reviews.text: Good solid portable gaming platform, only issue is it does not have a gsync card/screen. thats why I am rating it down a little, that and if running the screen it will drain the battery, usually not an issue because I connect the thing to the wall. Over all runs most games at high settings without any stuttering.
